summary.para: Initialization parameters for use with the FXECHO XAPOFX.

remarks.para: Use of this structure is optional. The default MaxDelay is FXECHO_DEFAULT_DELAY.
Note The DirectX SDK versions of XAUDIO2 don't support this functionality.
Windows 10 (XAudio2.9); Windows 8, Windows Phone 8 (XAudio 2.8); DirectX SDK (XAudio 2.7)

summary.para: Maximum delay (all channels) in milliseconds. This must be within FXECHO_MIN_DELAY and FXECHO_MAX_DELAY.
